dct_description_sm: Town map drafted by Frank D. Leffingwell, M.Am. Soc. C. E., City Surveyor, 460 Bloomfield Avenue, Montclair NJ. Map shows a numbered directory of significant buildings including schools, churches, cemeteries, hospitals and libraries. Trolley lines are indicated on map.
